author: Ben White
title: The government is all in on coronavirus: How it’s still not enough
description: Every policy solution has been small in scope for the problem we face.
content:
Unemployment benefits
The U.S. economy entered rapid free fall in March as Covid-19 cases spiked and states began issuing stay-at-home orders. Thus far, at least 22 million Americans have filed for initial unemployment benefits, essentially wiping out all th… [+6236 chars]
